page.title: 03Bondleigh Farm. Cattle
page.content: {Fresians}predominate, averaging 60_70 milking cows, 25_30 replacement heifers. Pedigree registered, semen from nominated bulls used to improve livestock.{Milk}is bought by Milk Marketing Board, transported in bulk milk tankers to milk factory at North Tawton for cheese and other milk products. Recent EEC. legislation restricts quantity of milk production to number of litres output per farm. {Dairy cattle}also crossed with{beef} {bulls}most popular breeds coming from continent are{Charolais, {Simmental and Limousine.}Intensive production of bull beef by rearing of uncastrated bull calves now considered alternative to conventional method of beef rearing and will produce cattle ready for slaughter at approximately 12 months old. Pure Devon bred prize winning cattle are reared at N.Tawton.
